items.title: Personal Developer Portfolio
items.subtitle: A modern, performance-focused portfolio built to showcase my projects, experience and technical background.

sections.title: The Challenge
text: I wanted a portfolio that goes beyond a static presentation and clearly communicates my technical depth, design thinking, and real-world experience.
The challenge was to keep the design clean while still supporting more complex content like project case studies, certifications, and multilingual support.

sections.title: The Approach
text: I designed the portfolio as a modular React application with reusable components and a clear content structure driven by i18n.
Special focus was put on performance, accessibility, responsive behavior and smooth user experience across devices.

sections.title: The Result
text: The result is a scalable and maintainable portfolio that can easily grow with new projects and content.
It serves both as a presentation tool and as a real-world example of how I approach frontend architecture and UX decisions.
